SEARCH
Package eclipproj

Class Session

java.lang.Object
eclipproj.Session
public class Session extends Object
class represents a session with a specific date, start time, end time, agenda, and a list of topics to be discussed during the session

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Session(String sessionDate, int startHour, int startMinute, int endHour, int endMinute, String agenda)
    Constructs a Session object with the specified date, start time, end time, and agenda.

  • Constructor Details

    • Session

      public Session(String sessionDate, int startHour, int startMinute, int endHour, int endMinute, String agenda)
      Constructs a Session object with the specified date, start time, end time, and agenda.
      Parameters:
      sessionDate - The date of the session
      startHour - The hour when the session starts (0-23)
      startMinute - The minute when the session starts (0-59)
      endHour - The hour when the session ends (0-23)
      endMinute - The minute when the session ends (0-59)
      agenda - The agenda of the session.

  • Method Details

    • setStartHour

      public void setStartHour(int startHour)
      Sets the start hour of the session.
      Parameters:
      startHour - The hour when the session starts (0-23).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the startHour is not between 0 and 23.

    • setStartMinute

      public void setStartMinute(int startMinute)
      Sets the start minute of the session.
      Parameters:
      startMinute - The minute when the session starts (0-59).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the startMinute is not between 0 and 59.

    • setEndHour

      public void setEndHour(int endHour)
      Sets the end hour of the session.
      Parameters:
      endHour - The hour when the session ends (0-23).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the endHour is not between 0 and 23.

    • setEndMinute

      public void setEndMinute(int endMinute)
      Sets the end minute of the session.
      Parameters:
      endMinute - The minute when the session ends (0-59).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the endMinute is not between 0 and 59.

    • addTopicOfDiscussion

      public void addTopicOfDiscussion(String topic)
      Adds a topic of discussion to the session's list of topics.
      Parameters:
      topic - The topic to be added to the discussion list.

    • getAgenda

      public String getAgenda()
      Gets the agenda of the session.
      Returns:
      The agenda of the session.

    • displayInfo

      public void displayInfo()
      Displays information about the session, including the date, start time, end time, agenda, and topics of discussion.
